Team Fortress 2 is a very fun and a team based game. There are a lot of game modes and maps to play on. You can also get hats that make you sexy. I really enjoy playing it and if you download it you will probably enjoy it too.

Really, TF2 is quite the game, it has a really problematic learning curve but once you pass it it's a really fun game to play by yourself or with friends, my only complaint is the lack of in game currency to by things with. Oh well, valve just wants money I guess.
